title: Monochrome
newbarktown_mom_talk1_1:
Hope you have a good
day, sweetheart.
newbarktown_mom_event1_1:
Goodmorning sweetheart.
You have a good
night sleep?
newbarktown_mom_event1_good_2:
I'd offer you breakfast,
but I have something
important to tell you!
newbarktown_mom_event1_bad_1:
Aww, that's sad to hear.
Bad dreams?
newbarktown_mom_event1_bad_2:
Well, I have some news
that'll make you feel a lot
better!
newbarktown_mom_event1_3:
Professor Elm called,
you got accepted into
the League Program!
newbarktown_mom_event1_4:
Isn't that exciting!
You'll get your own
partner and everything!
newbarktown_mom_event1_5:
Oh, I remember when I
challenged the league
myself.
newbarktown_mom_event1_6:
But that was a lifetime
ago and I never managed to
finish it,
newbarktown_mom_event1_7:
but it was certainly
an adventure.
newbarktown_mom_event1_8:
That was before the
Regional Government changed
the rules, though.
newbarktown_mom_event1_9:
Not much we can do
about that, though.
newbarktown_mom_event1_10:
But enough of your old
mother's ramblings.
newbarktown_mom_event1_11:
You should get going,
don't want to be late.
mom_event_3:
He said he wanted you

to do something for him.
mom_event_4:
Oh! I almost forgot!

Your Pokemon Gear
mom_event_5:
is back from

the repair shop.
mom_event_8:
It's essential if

you want to be a
mom_event_10:
By the way, do you

know how to use
mom_event_12_yes:
Don't you just turn

the PokeGear on and
mom_event_15_no:
Turn the PokeGear

on and select the
mom_event_17:
Phone number are stored

in -the balls- memory.
mom_event_18:
Just choose a name

you want to call.
mom_talk_1:
Prof. Elm is waiting

for you.
test_6:
The Town Where Winds of

a New Beginning Blow
event_0_2:
So this is the famous

Elm Laboratory...
event_1_1:
I can't leave town

without a Pokemon...
event_2_2:
I hear Prof. Elm

found some new Pokemon.
event_3_2:
Did your mom get

it for you?
tackle_desc: The user throws their body into the enemy.
scratch_desc: The user swipes in front of themselves with sharp claws.
growl_desc: The user lets out a intimidating growl that lowers the enemies Attack.
leer_desc: The user glares menacingly lowering the enemies Defense.
leafage_desc: The user sends out a gust of leaves, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving a pile of leaves that deals damage when stepped on.
ember_desc: The user spits a hot flame that deals damage and can burn.
watergun_desc: The user lets out a gush of water dealing damage with high knockback.
